title: Event Coordinator
company_description:
Established in 1982 and listed on Indonesia Stocks Exchange (IDX) since 1989, PT Pakuwon Jati Tbk is a diversified real estate developer focused in Jakarta, Surabaya, Solo, Yogyakarta, Bali, Bekasi & Batam. The Company's portfolio of prime properties includes retail, residential, commercial and hospitality developments. PT Pakuwon Jati is vertically integrated across the full real estate value chain from land acquisition, property development, marketing and operational management.

PT Pakuwon Jati Tbk is the pioneer of the Superblocks concept in Indonesia, a large-scale integrated mixed-use development of retail shopping malls, offices, condominiums, and hotels. Its successful track record and reputation within the property industry have secured a strong long-term relationship with tenants and buyers, which provides a stable platform for rapid business expansion.

title: Talent Acquisition Associate
company_type: 51-200 employees · Retail Health and Personal Care Products
company_description: Tentang Anak is Indonesia's fastest growing parenting tech company, providing a one stop solution child development ecosystem, combining Indonesia's best pediatric and early childhood development practitioners to provide curation of science-backed products and services for children's physical and mental development.
about_the_job:
About Tentang Anak

Imagine a career where you play a pivotal role in ensuring the success and bright future of 80 million children in Indonesia. Tentang Anak is not just a company; it's a mission, a movement, and an opportunity to be part of something truly extraordinary.

Tentang Anak, at its core, is driven by a mission to advance the well-being and development of 80 million children throughout Indonesia. Founded by a team of experts, including pediatricians, child psychologists, and early childhood educators, we are steadfast in our commitment to supporting children with the most reliable education and products. From educational tools (e.g., applications, books, flashcards, puzzles) to essential skincare, Tentang Anak aims to accompany and provide the best solutions for parents and their children, from the moment they wake up until they fall asleep.

Our products are the one and only in Indonesia that are developed by experts, backed by science, and offered at affordable prices. We are humbled by the love our products receive from parents, consistently ranking our Educational Tools and Skincare highly on e-commerce platforms, making them best-sellers. We will continue to innovate and provide better solutions for parents at every step of their journey. We are dedicated to creating a brighter, healthier, and happier future for the children of Indonesia.

Our employees, whom we call TAmily, are a group of relentless and passionate individuals who share the same mission and ambitions. Are you ready to join us in this mission?

About The Role

As a Talent Acquisition Associate at Tentang Anak, you will play a pivotal role in identifying, attracting, and retaining top talent to support our mission of providing innovative and impactful products for children. You'll collaborate closely with hiring managers to understand their needs, strategize recruitment plans, and ensure a seamless hiring process.

Job Responsibilities

Source and attract top-tier candidates through various channels, including job boards, social media, networking, and industry events.
Conduct initial interviews to evaluate candidate qualifications, skills, and cultural fit. 
Manage the end-to-end recruitment process, from job postings and candidate sourcing to offer negotiation and onboarding.
Collaborate with department heads to understand staffing needs and develop effective recruitment strategies.
Build and maintain a strong talent pipeline for current and future hiring needs.
Ensure a positive candidate experience throughout the recruitment process.


Requirements

Bachelor's degree in Psychology, Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
Proven experience (2+ years) in talent acquisition, preferably within the startup or consumer goods industry.
Strong understanding of sourcing techniques and experience using various recruitment tools and platforms.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage and build relationships with diverse candidates.
A strategic mindset with the ability to adapt to a fast-paced, evolving startup environment.
Exceptional organizational skills and attention to detail.
Familiarity with HRIS and Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) is a plus.

title: Sales Manager - Agency Channel (Financial Product)
company_description:
amalan is the leading provider of debt management programs for consumers in Indonesia. We help our customers to reduce the cost of their loans and to regain control of their finances.

amalan is the only company of its kind in Asia that has been accredited by IAPDA (http://www.iapda.org/accredited/amalan2739.htm).
about_the_job:
Cekaja.com is # 1 Fintech start up in Indonesia, in the digital financial marketplace space. We have the widest assortment of financial products in the market, across banking and insurance businesses, with almost all the leading brands as our client partners.

Within Cekaja.com, the Commercial team is tasked to manage the portfolio of products on the portal as well as add new assortment and products, to ensure our customers have the widest variety of financial products to suit their financial needs.

We are a small but highly agile unit which is tasked to deliver revenue for the company. Working in the Commercial unit will give you the opportunity to interact with the top banks and insurers in Indonesia. You will get to learn about all aspects of the banking and financial services industry as well as experience startup life like no other.

As part of our growth strategy, we collaborate with agencies comprised of independent financial advisors to extend our reach and serve more clients effectively. We are currently seeking a dynamic and results-driven Sales Manager to lead and manage our agency channel and drive the sales of our financial products through independent financial advisors.

Job Summary

The Sales Manager for the Agency Channel will be responsible for overseeing and optimizing the performance of agencies with independent financial advisors who sell our diverse portfolio of financial products to consumers. This role will require excellent leadership skills, deep knowledge of financial products, and a track record of successfully managing sales teams and driving revenue growth.

Responsibilities

Agency Channel Management:
Identify, recruit, and onboard new agencies with a focus on independent financial advisors who align with our company's values and objectives.
Cultivate strong relationships with agency leaders and individual financial advisors to enhance collaboration and foster a productive sales culture.
Provide ongoing support, training, and resources to the agencies to ensure they are well-equipped to sell our financial products effectively.
Sales Strategy and Execution:
Develop and execute a comprehensive sales strategy for the agency channel, setting clear objectives, sales targets, and KPIs.
Monitor agency performance, track sales metrics, and provide data-driven insights to improve sales effectiveness and achieve revenue goals.
Collaborate with marketing teams to design targeted campaigns and promotional activities to boost sales and brand awareness through the agency channel.
Performance Management:
Coach and mentor agency leaders and financial advisors to enhance their selling skills, product knowledge, and overall performance.
Conduct regular performance reviews, set development plans, and incentivize agencies to exceed sales targets.
Compliance and Regulatory Adherence:
Ensure that all agencies and financial advisors operate in compliance with relevant industry regulations and internal policies.
Conduct periodic audits and reviews to ensure adherence to best practices and legal requirements.
Market Analysis and Competitor Monitoring:
Stay up-to-date with industry trends, market conditions, and competitor activities to identify opportunities and potential challenges.
Use market insights to adapt sales strategies and product positioning to maintain a competitive edge.

Qualifications And Skills

Bachelor's degree in Business, Finance, or a related field (MBA preferred).
Proven experience in sales management within the financial services sector, preferably with a focus on insurance, investments, or banking products.
Strong understanding of financial products and their market dynamics.
Excellent leadership and communication skills to effectively motivate and manage agency leaders and financial advisors.
Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret sales data and use it to drive strategic decisions.
Demonstrated ability to meet and exceed sales targets in a competitive market.
Thorough knowledge of industry regulations and compliance standards.
Strong networking and relationship-building capabilities.
Professional certifications in relevant financial services areas will be an advantage.
Willing to work on commission-based terms. 

Join our team and play a crucial role in expanding our market presence, empowering independent financial advisors, and providing valuable financial solutions to consumers. If you are a driven and passionate individual with a strong sales background in the financial services industry, we'd love to hear from you.

title: Business Development (Mekari Talenta)
company_description:
Mekari is the #1 Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) company in Indonesia, aiming to empower the progress of businesses and professionals across various industries.

Our innovative cloud-based technology solution in HR (Mekari Talenta), Accounting (Mekari Jurnal), Sales (Mekari Qontak), Tax (Mekari Klikpajak), Electronic Signature (Mekari Sign), and Benefits (Mekari Flex) have been used by tens thousands of businesses in Indonesia.

To reach millions, we need more people like you —those eager to innovate, lead, and win with us.
about_the_job:
Mekari is Indonesia's no. 1 Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) company. Our mission is to empower businesses and professionals to progress effortlessly. Our products (Mekari Talenta, Mekari Jurnal, Mekari KlikPajak, & Mekari Qontak) have been used by tens of thousands of businesses in Indonesia.

To reach millions, we need more people like you: entrepreneurs, builders, owners inside the company who are eager to grow at scale. Join us to empower more businesses with technology.

Job Descriptions

Research companies to contact in.
Start Relationship with potential Manager or CEO.
Craft emails to those contacts to convey the value of our HRIS and book an introductory meeting with them.
Make cold and warm phone calls to contacts to follow up or preempt your email communications, manage the entire sales cycle, from prospecting to call, giving demos & closing.
Experiment with different outreach intervals and content to identify successful strategies.
Collaborate with engineering and customer success team to deliver product feedback and feature requests.
Analyze and target new opportunities for Accounting or HR Software to grow our footprint.
Work directly with marketing to discover opportunities from leads, and set appointments from those leads.
Use of strong selling and influencing skills to set up qualified appointments.
Log, track, and maintain customer contact and contact records.
Participate in community networking activities to promote Accounting or HR Software.

Requirements/Qualifications

Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Comfortable and confident speaking to mid-level and senior executives.
Strong organizational skills Strong interpersonal communication skills.
Analytical, detail-oriented and results-focused Scrappy and competitive!.
Desire to drive results and improve every single day.
Prior experience selling or marketing is a plus but is not required.
We’re seeking an exceptional individual to help drive the growth of our sales efforts in the rapidly changing local delivery industry.
If Possible Have 1-2 years of experience cold calling and selling SaaS or IT products (SMEs / SMBs), preferably from Bachelor Degree in Accountancy, Management, or equivalent, but Fresh Graduate is also welcomed.
If possible track record of over-achieving quota.
Proficient with corporate productivity and with web presentation tools.
Have a positive, can-do attitude, extraordinary hustle, disdain for failure, and hunger/appreciation for feedback.
Have extraordinary oral & written communication skills.
Have deep self-motivation and the ability to self-manage.
Huge plus: experience selling to HR Manager, CEO, Accountant or Finance Manager Comfortable working in a small, distributed team.

What You Will Get

 Competitive salary + daily allowance.
 Premium private health insurance (outpatient, inpatient, maternity, dental).
 Early access to salary + flex installment (employee loan) via Mekari Flex.
 Allowance for sports activities and glasses/contact lenses.
 Flexible working hours and remote work culture with free co-working space services.
 Annual and unpaid leaves from day 1 of join date + unlimited sick leave with doctor note.
 Notebook Ownership Program.
 Strategic office location, accessible by MRT.
 Friendly and dynamic work environment.
 Opportunity to take part in growing Indonesia's no. 1 SaaS company

Our team will review your application and will be in touch if your application is shortlisted to the next stage. If you do not hear from us in 30 days, we will keep your resume on file in case a relevant opportunity opens up.

Don't forget to check our Recruitment FAQ at bit.ly/RecruitmentFAQ-Mekari [ENG] or bit.ly/RekrutmenMekari-FAQ [INA] to find the answers to commonly-asked questions regarding our recruitment process.

We wish you the best. Hope to see you around soon!

title: General Affairs Specialist
about_the_job:
Job Description

Maintain office facility and assets: liaise with building management, make sure the environment could promote the productive work, neat, tidy, and clean all the time, record all the office assets, routine office facility checking, office renovation.
Liaise with Finance & Accounting department to calculate and prepare annual budget related with General Affairs.
Assist in the establishment of Company standby-points/branch offices from the beginning until the end.
Purchasing: Supervise routine and non-routine office purchase such as pantry and stationery stock, other new office facility and make sure the stock is sufficient, maintaining good relationship and negotiate with vendor.
Legal: Maintain all office legal and permit document, dealing and liaise with related external party.
Supervise and coordinate outsource driver and outsource OB.
Vendor and FA Bridging: Work closely with vendor and Finance Accounting to make sure the vendor invoice and all supporting document is completed, and payment done in timely manner.
Office Working Schedule: Office closure announcement and Indonesia office calendar sharing with headquarter, include timesheet revision.
Business Trip arrangement: Arrange ticket, accommodation, transport for business trip both domestic and overseas, calculate the transport expense.
Office contribution arrangement: flower arrangement for special event, employee fund for special event.

Required Skills / Experience

Minimum 3 years of experience in GA or Office Service.
Wide networking, and good interpersonal skill.
Bachelor’s degree in any field.
Language requirement: Fluent in English both verbal and written, Mandarin will be a plus.
Have broad knowledge and experience in permit, company legal document permit and renewal.
Good problem solving, interpersonal relation & negotiation skill.
Detail-oriented and possess excellent communication and time management skills.

title: Sales Engineer

Aiming to be more than family business - but beyond that, we are business for families, we carry the mission to bring values for betterment of lives through business development and continuous growth.
about_the_job:

title: Marketing Staff
company_description: We are a subsidiary company of PT. Astra Otoparts Tbk and also affiliated company of Triputra Group running the business in automotive component industry, which produces wheel rim, for both two and four wheelers supplying to Original Equipment for Manufacturer (OEM) in Indonesia as well as export market. Our customer isn't only domestic market (Toyota, Daihatsu, Nissan, Astra Honda Motor, Mitsubishi, etc) but also overseas including Italy (OZ Racing), Hungary (Suzuki), Japan (Toyota, Suzuki, Nissan), Malaysia (Perodua & Isuzu) and Thailand (GM).
about_the_job:
Responsibilities

As a Marketing Staff, you are responsible for:

Develop concepts to support sales targets, new orders, market share, inventory control/delivery schedules, as well as networking.
Maintain and improve customer relationship.
Provide constructive input related to marketing medium.
Ensure business processes with customers are in accordance with the specified targets.
Conduct customer satisfaction surveys to customers
Make improvements in the work area

Requirements

We Need Marketing Staff Who Are

Diploma of Marketing, Management, or any related field.
Minimum 1 year experience as a Marketing Staff; fresh graduates are welcome to apply.
Proficient in Microsoft Office (Word, PowerPoint, Excel).
Able to work under high pressure.
Have a good analysis and logic thinking.
Eager to learn, have a good attitude and excellent communication skills.
High initiative and improvement ideas.
Able to work in teams (strong leadership) and individually.
Have a driving license (SIM A & C) (SIM C is a must, SIM A will be a plus point).
Placement in Karawang Area.

title: Business Development Manager - Smart Living & Office Solution
company_description:
Welcome to the Michael Page global company profile.

Michael Page has five decades of expertise in professional services recruitment. We were established in London in 1976, and over this period we've grown organically to become one of the best-known and most respected consultancies, with an office network spanning six continents.

While size has its advantages, it doesn't define us - the nature of our organic growth means that each new office is integrated into the region that it serves. It also means that as an employer looking to hire, or as a candidate aiming to grow your career you have the best of both worlds; a team that understands the market and geography you operate in, plus the resources and expertise of an international network at your disposal.

Our teams are broken down to focus on industry, assignment type, salary level and location, so your hiring requirements or job search will all be handled by a specialist who knows your sector inside-out. We are confident that our expertise can add value to your recruitment or job search process – get in touch to find out more.
about_the_job:
Excellent remuneration package|Great career growth


About Our Client

The client is a multinational company and a leader in Smart Living/Office systems. Mastering integration of the whole ecosystem and also bringing the most hi-tech solution, they're constantly breaking new barriers and excelling in the market with their expertise.

Job Description

Key responsibilities include (but are not limited to):
Be at the forefront of the market to gain market intel on market demands
Build and maintain relationship with key customers and partners in order to secure projects for share of pocket in the market
Actively promote the company's hi-tech solutions and potential in the market to gain market awareness
Provide necessary support to and coordination with other operating teams in order to win market business
Do market research and mapping to understand the company's brand position and actively aim to grow market share
The Successful Applicant

The successful candidate is someone with strong experience and exposure in Office/Building/Home automation, potentially with a mixed experience of Access Control, Home/Building Security, Smart Home/Building Solutions, Building/Office Networking, and other fields related to smart space technology.

The candidate also possesses strong track record in building company brand reputation and growing market share in the related field, with strong networks with the end users or other channels or supporting players, such as contractors, system integrators, consultants, etc.

What's On Offer

The client offers excellent remuneration package and great career growth.

Contact: Stephen Andrean

Quote job ref: JN-062023-6082684
